modName: Blood on the Ice Fix - Purchase Hjerim
summary: This file fixes the glitch were you can\'t complete the Blood on the Ice quest. It also allows you to purchase Hjerim, and fixes the glitched furnature that gets stuck.
descriptionHtml:
Instructions
Place both files in the Data folder
type \"bat BuyHjerim\"
then go inside Hjerim and type \"bat CleanButcher\"
Save the Game and Reload

Note: You still must have the 12,000 Gold to purchase the house in your inventory. Capitalization does not matter.
author: mageesty

files.name: Blood on the Ice Fix - Purchase Hjerim
files.fileName: Blood on the Ice Fix - Purchase Hjerim-16542-V1-0.zip
